snippet.title: Escape From Planet Aelea | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape from Planet Aelea is a new game from DASA Studios, releasing on Steam this summer. 

Play as astronaut Jennifer Sousa and evade deadly robots, solve puzzles to collect access keys,  and uncover the secrets of outpost 3 to escape planet Aelea!

Producer - Bobby Vivian
Lead Artist - Julia Sousa
Lead Programmers - Charlie Filce & Joey Sheridan
Lead Level designer - Dana Davidson

Trailer music by Christian Valencia
